entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XSLTs are not possible in NativeAOT #84389
  • Seeing HTTP Client timeout issue after upgrading to dotnet core 6.0 #84388
  • Disable JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #84378
    8.0.0
  • Unsafe.As doesn't update type information in JIT #84377
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator Does Not Seem to Work With .NET Framework 4.8 #84376
  • Extend `Utf8JsonReader.CopyString` to also accept `JsonTokenType.Number` values #84375
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Optimize the access pattern to threadstatics. #84373
  • How to publish an app using daily runtime packages? #84372
  • Changing TargetName in csproj breaks app host #84371
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.DefaultTemplate_AOT_InProjectFile Test failed #84368
    8.0.0
  • WASM DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.JSConditionalBreakpoint Failure #84367
  • Timeouts in Socket tests on Debian.*.Arm32.Open #84364
    8.0.0
  • "System.Console.Clear()" does not clear the scroll buffer on Linux. #84351
  • [API Proposal]: Decouple ValidateOnStart from Hosting #84347
    8.0.0
  • self-contained publish app crashes with missing files after update .net7.0.3 -> 7.0.4 #84346
  • Directory.Delete(string, bool) throws StackOverflowException #84344
  • [6.0] tvOS arm64 build graph failure: project file not loaded System.Composition.AttributedModel.csproj #84334
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: `MethodImplOptions.Cold` for marking cold methods for the JIT #84333

Closed

  • JSON source generator crawling never picks up a property #84190
  • Add an AppContext switch that disables using reflection by default in JsonSerializerOptions #83279
    8.0.0
  • Avoid duplicate cmp instruction, avoid boolean zero extension #70003
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ToArray and ToList overloads with length argument #83807
  • Deadlock when using TryStartNoGCRegion and/or GC.Collect #84096
    8.0.0
  • Authentication failed when trying to connect to secure websocket with android 8 #83118
  • WASM windows AOT: Timeout compiling native assets with emcc with -Oz #84362
  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary.TrySetValue #83920

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Implement LEAVE_CHECK in the jiterpreter (as a bailout) #84387
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix Ordinal Ignore Case string compare #84386
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assert. #84385
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Disable nullability checks in file shared between the managed type system and ILVerificationTests #84382
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • Simplify target to enable config binding src generator and rename enabling property #84379
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fixes for BuildAsStandalone in tests #84374
    test-bug, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve regex compiler / source generator for sets #84370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Reduce the trim requirements on MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute #84369
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Roslyn dependency version in source-build #84366
    blocking, area-Infrastructure, partner-impact
  • Enable building preview workload components #84365
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    needs-area-label
  • [release/6.0] Fix pinned assembly version 6.0 #84357
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix pinned assembly version 7.0 #84355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Set GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED properly in block morph #84352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Optimize pairs of "str wzr" to "str xzr" #84350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid unnecessary GTF_GLOB_REFs #84349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX-512 in Memmove unrolling #84348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with miniJIT #84345
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.16 #84342
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.5 #84341
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [CI][Android] Show disk usage before build #84340
    needs-area-label
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration #84339
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move startup hook tests targeting `StartupHookProvider` out of hosting tests #84338
    area-Host
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #84337
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #84336
    area-codeflow
  • Use a tuned ConcurrentDictionary in the default caching implementation for the COM source generator #84335
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Speed up named type lookups in managed type system #84285
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Free up more disk space on CI builds #84354
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing step to native AOT dev workflow instructions #84381
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF] Removed pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui-iOS #84363
    area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid scaning the used region if there are no free units #81525
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement the JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [wasm][debugger] Retry after timeout on debugger tests on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2151332 #84276
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84189
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assert in the aot compiler. #84343
  • Switch CustomAttributeTypeNameParser to use common type name parser #84281
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid clearing uncommitted mark array #83623
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Ensure tail merging does not add preds to scratch block #84353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Freeze the emscripten cache #84356
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Implement the ENDFINALLY opcode in the jiterpreter #84273
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Simd refactoring #84170
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Enabled Sqrt and Abs intrinsics #84011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.17 #84315
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.6 #84316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0] Add check-service-labels.yml to unblock base branch PRs #84332
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Add check-service-labels.yml to unblock base branch PRs #84331
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Don't overwrite pinned assembly versions in servicing #84079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Allow JSImport promises to run on managed threadpool worker threads #83838
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Use better trimming message in ValidationContext #84326
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part2 (down-level support) #84235
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Add HttpClient.Shared #84327
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add back IComparable-based optimization to FrozenDictionary/Set #84301
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [browser] Blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-codeflow
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` compare #84249
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [test] Try to get more details from hanging build #84253
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • JIT: Add a (disabled) prototype for a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable VectorLookup tests for mono. #84330
  • Correctly display the GCSettings specified in the runtimeconfig json via the GC Configuration API Call #84201
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add the possibility replace a nuget source (force dotnet nuget add) #31461
  • dotnet test exit with code 2 when test run aborted #31364
  • dotnet test build fails with error MSB4803 #30514

Updated

  • The error message (& output) for NETSDK1148 could be MUCH more helpful #31557
  • Solution builds fine in Visual Studio but remote build failing in Azure DevOps failing with 'Error MSB406' #31380
  • Allow dotnet test command to override the Net runtime version #31102
  • Wrong assembly is being referenced in solution #3301
    Discussion
  • GenAPI incorrectly generates collection-based interface implementation #31570
  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #30289
  • The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'linux-linux/amd64' is not recognized #31616
  • Dotnet test doesn't run separate TargetFrameworks in parallel #19147
    Backlog
  • Option --list-tests should take into account --filter option #8643
    Backlog
  • DotNet Test is no longer filtering by Category #30931
  • "dotnet test" using the glob pattern #30655
  • Switch language for .NET CLI on macOS/Linux #13938
    Backlog
  • dotnet publish fails with --output Cannot create/move a file when that file already exists #30321

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31629
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • GenAPI: a work around for a generation an explicit interface implementation indexer. #31628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property #31626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.2 to 19.12.0 in /eng/dependabot #31576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2150801 #31622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.117 #31602
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Killbit BinaryFormatter across most .NET 8 project types #31591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Prep 7.0.3xx for GA release #31618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Respond to ProduceReferenceAssembly default changing to true #31598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP do no review yet] Use MSBuild Server in interactive mode only #31597
    Area-CLI
  • add implementation and test for add Trademark assembly attribute #31611
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mechanism to track source generators contributing to assembly #67663
  • `IGeneratorContext.AddSource` throws ArgumentException wrongly claiming invalid filename on linux #67653
  • IDE0045 goves a false positive #67649
  • Extracting method after confirmations does nothing #67647
    Backlog

Closed

  • `IDE0059` is not fired for property pattern assignment #66573
    Backlog
  • Remove optional parameters from IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #67434

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix message in make struct member readonly analyzer #67664
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations due to StateSet enumerations of project/activefile states. #67662
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Store parameter locations as a OneOrMany #67661
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not allocate location arrays when determining if a symbol is within a tree #67659
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #67658
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay create AliasesAndUsings data until needed #67655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add info to let named types quickly return 'null' when they have no primary constructor #67652
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve performance if testing if a trivia is strutured trivia or not. #67651
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce the size/cost of explicit enum symbols #67657
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache assembly qualified names as they're expensive to compute #67656
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix publishdata to create non-draft PRs for main #67654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix semantic tokens refresh queue to send requests #67646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix for FixAll in project and solution scopes for non-C#/VB projects #67650
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Upgrade to latest RoslynDiagnosticsNugetPackageVersion #67648
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove optional parameters from IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #67635
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, untriaged, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] AnalyzerDriver performance improvements #67591
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance, untriaged, Next
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • [17.6] Cache source generator node tables only if their state counts match #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting route order imperatively #47579
  • Heartbeat.TimerLoop continues running after WebHost stopped and disposed #47577
  • Support using Blazor to build .NET tools #47576
    Backlog
  • Append Hashes To Blazor Published Files #47575
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal: Trigger AuthenticationStateChanged event when initialized from browser cache #47574
  • Object reference error from DefaultHttpRequest.set_RouteValues #47573
  • Use FrozenDictionary where appropriate #47569

Closed

  • MinimalAPI - RequestDelegateFactory - IOException Generates Http StatusCode 200 (on FormReading) #47578
  • Identity database scaffolding #46970
  • CanHaveBody should be false for HTTP/2 CONNECT #46002
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add user defined request header variable (variables), as a parameter to the LoadAssembliesAsync in blazor #47570
    Discussions
  • Run ASP.Net Core on Mobile OSs like Ionic capacitor #47565
  • Love the new highlight syntax when doing routing #47572
  • Ability to opt into streaming SSR on a per-subtree basis #46993
    8.0-preview4
  • [Minimal API] IFormFile does not bind when using WithOpenApi extension method #47526

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Heartbeat logging after disposal #47580
    area-runtime
  • Obsolete concurrency limiter middleware. #47571
    breaking-change, area-runtime, needs-breaking-change-announcement

Merged

  • Signify bodylessness for HTTP/2 extended CONNECTs #47550
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Control streaming SSR per subtree #47555
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • Added enableRangeProcessing parameter to TypedResult.Stream(...) #47558
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, pr: pending author input
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-signalr
  • Set exception handler feature in developer exception page #47554
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Try skipping tests with Japanese chars #47560
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting error on code that is not generated in MAUI #14430
  • When I run my .Net Maui project and enter a page it says "application has stopped" and the execution ends, on android #14429
  • When I run my .Net Maui project and enter a page it says "application has stopped" and the execution ends, on android #14428
  • OnIdom or StaticResource typo's create an app crash in release mode #14427
  • Maui : iOS - Switch color doesn't revert on off #14426
  • MAUI XAML build error when using Data Template and binding #14425
  • Delete and Add a row messes up the sequencing in a custom grid control #14424
  • Custom controls pushing 'buttons' out of view results in loss of event clicked processing #14423
  • The .NET MAUI base template project doesn't compile #14422
  • Maui app black screen in ipad (iPadOS 16.4) #14421
  • The default MAUI app template should disable Catalyst on Windows #14419
  • [Android] VerticalStackLayout inside of ScrollView doesn't center #14418
  • iOS Crash CarouselView has MediaElement in ItemTemplate #14417
  • Why if I use a command to back to previous page it is not animated in a MAUI application? #14415
  • .NET MAUI WebView cannot open links to websites other than its source #14414
  • Image size constraints don't work properly #14411
  • [iOS] Black screen on launch #14408
  • MAUI BlazorWebView does not support transparent page background in iOS #14407
    Backlog
  • [iOS and Mac] - Blank rendering in FlowDirection right to left from .net 7.0 #14406
  • Button properties are inconsistent when applying android themes #14404

Closed

  • Can't set the app name in MacCatalyst project for macOS #12287
    Backlog
  • Upgrading to Visual Studio 17.5 broke MAUI Windows Slider #13917
    Backlog
  • DeploymentManagerAutoInitializer currently not working as intended #14105
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CarouselView "Scrolled" event never fires #12725
    .NET 8
  • Shell.Title and Window.Title currently doesn't propagate to the catalyst window title #11263
    Backlog
  • [Android] Image is clipped during animation #7182

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Prepare the maui-template to work out of the repo pipeline. #14420
  • Propagate Title to android and ios window #14413
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Core] Fix Border margin issue #14402
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border

Merged

  • Remove Deployment Manager workaround #14398
    backport/suggested
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] [CI] Fix the maui-tempaltes yaml to work in the unified pipeline. #14416
  • [net7.0] Hook up CarouselView Scrolled event on Windows #14409
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [CI] Fix the maui-tempaltes yaml to work in the unified pipeline. #14396
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14400
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.2 to 4.1.3 #14384
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Propagate title property to catalyst window #14399
    backport/suggested
  • Hook up CarouselView Scrolled event on Windows #14405
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • [net7.0] Fix incorrect caching of unconstrained measures (#14373) #14389

Updated

  • Keyboard test fixes v2 #14397
  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132

    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [android] reduce Java interop for `ContentViewGroup` and `WrapperView` #14275
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix clipping issues with some views #14362
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core adding a migration exception using DDD and value objects #30639
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException raised when inserting into Postgres partitioned table #30638
  • Why does EF Core try to create objects that are not present in the class? #30636
  • Duplicate subquery when doing base type/derived type projection #30635
  • Moving entity between collections inconsistently deletes children #30634

Closed

  • Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30330
    7.0.6
  • Linq select cannot project an entity containing both Json columns and ICollections #30266
    7.0.6
  • Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30565
    7.0.6
  • EFCore6.x 用代码实现自动迁移 #30619
  • RowLimitingOperationWithoutOrderByWarning false positive #30550
  • Simple migration apparently completed, but prompt in Package Manager Control not restored #30548
  • Add-Migration is not recognized in Package Manager unless two instances of the Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design package are installed. #30547
  • Error when connect database transient failure in Visual Studio 2022 #30546
  • Generated SQL add extra precision to decimal constant without precision #30545
  • Owned type and inheritance issue #30541
  • InvalidOperationException with GroupBy() #30495
  • Use generic attribute for EntityTypeConfiguration attribute #30606
  • NullRef scaffolding Postgres DB #30621

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid updating unchanged properties #30640
    Servicing-consider
  • Update SqliteMigrationsSqlGenerator.cs #30637

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30330 - Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30615
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix for #30266 and #30565 - projecting json entity/reference as well as regular entity collection #30600
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6

Updated

  • Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #30617
  • Scaffolding: Fix handling of ConnectionString annotation #30631

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • x86 .NET installs to program files on 32bit windows #15972
  • Generic naming for .NET Core SDK CoreXT packages for internal Microsoft use #6518

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable PVP flow for emsdk #15995
  • Prevent prebuilt tarball reuse in SB bootstrap leg #15964
    Area-SourceBuild

Updated

  • Add KnownWebAssemblySdkPack to GenerateBundledVersions #15951
    Area-NetSDK
  • Use artifacts and SDK from latest Preview 3 build #15980
